descriptor.name: Mock PaaS provider
descriptor.description: Plugin that contains a single paas provider for deployments' mocking.

componentDescriptors.name: Mock Orchestrator Factory
componentDescriptors.description:
Orchestrator Factory that instanciate orchestrators that just mocks deployment. Used for our automated tests the plugin suceed for every application except an application named:
 - BAD-APPLICATION: The deployment will fail.
 - WARN-APPLICATION: The deployment will ends up in a warning state.
